name: rebass
description: React functional UI component design system
author: Brent Jackson

scripts.build: mkdir -p build && npm run data && webpack -p --progress --colors

components.description: Arrow for use in dropdowns and other UI elements
components.name: Arrow
AspectRatio

components.description: A circular image for displaying user avatars

size.description: Width and height of image in pixels

components.name: Avatar

components.description: Component for displaying small status indicators
components.name: Badge

components.description: Full-height banner with styling for background images
components.name: Banner
Bar

components.description: Generic box with visual styling

borderColor.description: Border color - can either be a key from the theme colors object or any color value

borderTop.description: Adds a border to the top side

borderRight.description: Adds a border to the right side

borderBottom.description: Adds a border to the bottom side

borderLeft.description: Adds a border to the left side

components.name: Block

components.description: Stylized blockquote element with citation link
components.name: Blockquote

components.description: Box component for adding box shadows
components.name: BoxShadow

components.description: Breadcrumb navigation links
components.name: Breadcrumbs

components.description: A general purpose button element with customizable colors

href.description: Pass an href prop to make the Button an <a> tag instead of a <button>

big.description: Creates a larger button by adding padding

size.description: Sets height of button in pixels

baseRef.description: Adds a ref to the button element

components.name: Button

components.description: A general purpose outline style button element with customizable colors

href.description: Pass an href prop to make the ButtonOutline an <a> tag instead of a <button>

components.name: ButtonOutline

components.description: Styled box with border
components.name: Card

components.description: Image for use within the Card component
components.name: CardImage

components.description: Carousel that wraps children and displays one at a time

index.description: Index for the child to show

components.name: Carousel

components.description: Checkbox input with label

stacked.description: Place label centered under the radio

baseRef.description: Adds a ref to the input element

components.name: Checkbox
Circle

components.description: A button with an × for close and dismiss actions

baseRef.description: Adds a ref to the button element

components.name: Close

components.description: Code element for inline code snippets
components.name: Code

components.description: Div with max-width and margin auto for centering content
components.name: Container

components.description: Styled hr element

width.description: Sets a fixed width for stylistic options

components.name: Divider

components.description: A single-value donut chart with percentage
components.name: Donut

components.description: Dot indicator buttons for use in carousels

length.description: Number of dot buttons to show

active.description: Index of the currently active dot

onClick.description: Click event callback - returns index of clicked button

components.name: DotIndicator

components.description: An off-canvas drawer component

size.description: Width or height of drawer, depending on placement

onDismiss.description: Click event callback for the background overlay

components.description: Position relative container for positioning DropdownMenu component
components.name: Dropdown

components.description: Absolutely positioned Menu component for use within Dropdown component

onDismiss.description: Click event callback for the background overlay

components.description: Responsive media embed wrapper
components.name: Embed

components.description: Layout container for fixed positioning children
components.name: Fixed

components.description: Minimal footer component with top border
components.name: Footer

components.description: Wrapper component to control border radii and alignment of child button components
components.name: Group

components.description: Heading element with no margin and size based on fontSizes scale

big.description: Doubles the visual size - useful for marketing pages

alt.description: Applies alternate styling - useful for slugs and subheadings

components.name: Heading

components.description: Heading element with unstyled link. Useful for in-page navigation
components.name: HeadingLink

components.description: Input element with label with support for aria-invalid, disabled, and readOnly HTML attributes

message.description: Adds a helper or error message below the input

autoOff.description: Disables autocomplete, autocorrect, autocapitalize, and spellcheck props

baseRef.description: Adds a ref to the input element

components.name: Input

components.description: Inline grouped form for search or other simple forms

components.description: Label element for form controls

hide.description:
Accessibly hide label for use in high density UI.
 This can still cause accessibility issues. Use this with caution.

components.name: Label

components.description: Unstyled display block link
components.name: LinkBlock

components.description: List component that accepts any child component item types

ordered.description: Changes the root component to an ordered list

flush.description: Removes padding left to keep text flush-left

components.name: List

components.description: Media object with vertical alignment using flexbox
components.name: Media

components.description: Menu component for navigation links and actions
components.name: Menu

components.description: Component for displaying flash and error messages
components.name: Message

components.description: Link for use in navigation. Inherits color

small.description: Sets a smaller font size for compact UI

baseRef.description: Adds a ref to the link element

components.name: NavItem

components.description: Fixed positioned overlay for use with modal dialogs

box.description: Sets padding and background white for the content container

onDismiss.description: Click event callback for the Overlay background

x.description: Width of space based on the spacing scale
